name: GetCurrentSlackTeamInfo
description:
Retrieve information about the current Slack team.

This tool is used to get information about the current Slack team, including settings and general details. It is called when there's a need to access team information in a Slack workspace.

parameters.name: query_by_domain
parameters.description: Comma-separated domains to query instead of a team, used when the team is not specified. This only works for domains in the same enterprise as the querying team token.

parameters.name: specific_team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Slack team to retrieve information about. If omitted, information about the current team will be returned.

parameters.name: auth_token
parameters.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Query by domain instead of team (only when team is null). This only works for domains in the same enterprise as the querying team token. This also expects the domain to belong to a team and not the enterprise itself. This is the value set up for the 'Joining This Workspace' workspace setting. If it contains more than one domain, the field will contain multiple comma-separated domain values. If no domain is set, the field is empty.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: Team to get info about; if omitted, will return information about the current team.
